content.rendered:
Directed by Hansal Mehta.

Written by Apurva Asrani. Chintan Shah.

Cast Kangana Ranaut(Praful Patel). Sohum Shah(Sameer). Esha Tewari(Salma). Jason Louder(Bugs). Aneesha Joshi(Amber). Mark Justice(Adam). Rupinder Nagra(Mike Mehndi). Catherine Dyer(Cynthia). James Cole(Steven). Robin Dyke(Julie). Alexander Garganera(Waiter). Timothy Ryan Hickernell(Joe). Manda Lee(Noella). Yajhayra Maria(Betty). Rusty Meyers(Michael). Robert Mitchel Owenby(Trystan the Gas Attendant). Albert Roberts(Jerry). Rich Robertson(Bank Teller). Jeff Rose(Robert). Maniissh Karma(Bank Patron (as Manesh k Singh)). Patti Schellhaas(Luxury Lady). Leigh Takata(Bank Teller). Evette Young(Young woman). Maiya Boyd(Salma’s daughter Malala). Zachary Coffin(HR Manager). Rodney Luis Aquino(Bank Patron). Roger Julian Cross(Cashier Security Guard). Alex(Security Guard3). Alexander(Security Guard2). Arush(Small Boy). Backagaindancer(Suman). Rosie Baglee(Dancer). Govind Chaudhary(Amber’s Husband). Monica Chitkara(Mrs. Parekh). Parimal Desai(Amber’s Father). Nikhil Dhawan(Nikhil). Ellie Flory Fawcett(Ellie Housekeeper). 

Language Hindi.

Producers Amit Agarwal. Vishesh Agrawal. Kavan Ahalpara. Hanif Chunawala. Tom Hamilton. Manohar P. Kanungo. Bhushan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Beth Haden Marshall. Alan McAlex. Sanjeevkumar Nair. Ajay Rai. Adam Renshaw. Tripp Rhame. Shaailesh R Singh. Alok Tripathi.

Production Adarsh Telemedia. Fortune Films. Jar Pictures.
